header.p: I am a Front-end developer who transforms pixels into experiences.

about-me.p: I am Carlos Eduardo and I started programming at the age of 14. I enjoy keeping up with the latest trends and technologies to enhance the projects I work on. I am always learning and seeking new challenges, which keeps my passion for programming alive.

skills.p: JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Responsive design, Intuitive design.

more-about-me.p-end: or follow my ideas and experiences through my posts on

devkiit.title: DevKiit
devkiit.subtitle: A set of web tools.
devkiit.description: DevKiit is a suite of tools for developers and general users, offering essential functionalities to optimize workflow.

zen-homepage.title: ZEN HOMEPAGE
zen-homepage.subtitle: Minimalist homepage for browsers.
zen-homepage.description: ZEN HOMEPAGE is a minimalist homepage for browsers, designed to offer practical tools such as conversions, a calculator, random password generation, custom search, and much more.

dev-links.title: Dev Links
dev-links.subtitle: Platform that centralizes content for developers.
dev-links.description: Dev Links is a platform that centralizes free content for developers. Here you will find courses, books, challenges, tutorials, and documentation organized by categories.

NotFound.p: Lost? Don't worry, even the best explorers get lost sometimes.
